attributes.action: Give All key workers during covid-19 a bonus payment
attributes.additional_details: Those that aren’t key workers therefor aren’t working are entitled to 80% of there wages under government legislation. Those that have to work to keep the country going deserve a financial reward. From NHS to care workers to supermarket workers.
attributes.background: Set a bonus payment amount to reward all key workers working through covid-19.

rejection.details:
ou may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
